attributes.action: FREE SCHOOL MEALS FOR ALL THAT NEED IT! No criteria
attributes.additional_details:
Remove the criteria.. offer free meals to all to encourage better attendance  better learning and support the middle class. 
Children need this..I needed it and it was the main readon I went to school and too many parents sent  Hildenborough yo school with no food
attributes.background:
No child in the UK should go hungry and free school meals should be available in school during term time until they are 18. IT WILL ENCOURAGE HIGHER ATTENDANCE AND BE FUEL TO IMPROVE BETTER LEARNING IN LESSONS. 
Too many children eat nothing  during the day and pretend it's a choice when it's not.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617633
